sqlMap.select:
SELECT c.*,m.`MEMBER_NAME` member_name,au.`USER_NAME` add_user_name,lu.`LM_USER` lm_user_name,cu.`USER_NAME` sd_user_name,nu.`USER_NAME` nd_check_user_name,d.`dept_cname` apply_dept_name,smd.`USER_NAME` smd_user_name,fd.`USER_NAME` fd_user_name FROM qkjm_r_closeorder c LEFT JOIN s_vip_member m ON (c.`member_id`=m.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user au ON(c.`add_user`=au.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user lu ON(c.`lm_user`=lu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user cu ON(c.`sd_user`=cu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user nu ON(c.`nd_check_user`=nu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user smd ON(c.`smd_user`=smd.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user fd ON(c.`fd_check_user`=fd.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (c.apply_dept = d.dept_code)
c.uuid=#uuid# c.cost_types=#cost_types# (c.type=#type# or c.type=2) c.type=#typeO# c.apply_id=#apply_id# c.add_time LIKE CONCAT(#add_time#,'%') c.close_time=#close_time# c.content=#content# c.member_id=#member_id# c.member_address=#member_address# c.nd_check_state=#nd_check_state# c.state=#state# c.sd_state=#sd_state# c.smd_status=#smd_status# c.theme LIKE CONCAT('%',#theme#,'%')
c.apply_dept=#apply_dept# c.apply_dept LIKE CONCAT(#apply_dept#,'%')
c.apply_dept In #apply_depts[]#
c.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# c.add_user=#apply_userDouble#
c.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# c.add_user=#apply_userDouble#
(c.sd_state=60 or c.sd_state=80 or (c.apply_dept like '312%' and c.sd_state=40) ) and fd_check_state=0
c.apply_dept not like '312%'
ORDER BY c.add_time DESC LIMIT 1000

Select Count(*) From qkjm_r_closeorder c LEFT JOIN s_vip_member m ON (c.`member_id`=m.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user au ON(c.`add_user`=au.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user lu ON(c.`lm_user`=lu.`UUID`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user nu ON(c.`nd_check_user`=nu.`UUID`)
c.uuid=#uuid# (c.type=#type# or c.type=2) c.type=#typeO# c.apply_id=#apply_id# c.add_time LIKE CONCAT(#add_time#,'%') c.close_time=#close_time# c.content=#content# c.member_id=#member_id# c.member_address=#member_address# c.nd_check_state=#nd_check_state# c.state=#state# c.sd_state=#sd_state# c.smd_status=#smd_status# c.theme LIKE CONCAT('%',#theme#,'%')
c.apply_dept=#apply_dept# c.apply_dept LIKE CONCAT(#apply_dept#,'%')
c.apply_dept In #apply_depts[]#
c.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# c.add_user=#apply_userDouble#
c.apply_dept In #apply_perdepts[]# c.add_user=#apply_userDouble#
LIMIT 1000
sqlMap.update:
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set close_time=#close_time#, content=#content#, theme=#theme#, lm_time=#lm_time#, lm_user=#lm_user#, salPro_id=#salPro_id#, apply_dept=#apply_dept#, close_note=#close_note#, m_name=#m_name#,
m_upprice=#m_upprice#, m_price=#m_price#, m_bprice=#m_bprice#, f_upprice=#f_upprice#, f_price=#f_price#, f_bprice=#f_bprice#, is_fullcheck=#is_fullcheck#, close_num=#close_num#,
member_id=#member_id#, member_address=#member_address#, member_phone=#member_phone#, member_title=#member_title#, mt_price=#mt_price#, member_note=#member_note#,
cost_types=#cost_types#
Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set lm_time=#lm_time#, lm_user=#lm_user#, salPro_id=#salPro_id# Where uuid = #uuid#

Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set member_id=#member_id#, member_address=#member_address#, member_phone=#member_phone#, member_title=#member_title#, mt_price=#mt_price#, member_note=#member_note# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set sd_state=#sd_state#, sd_time=#sd_time#, sd_user=#sd_user#, lm_time=#lm_time#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set smd_status=#smd_status#, smd_time=#smd_time#, smd_user=#smd_user#, lm_time=#lm_time#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set state=#state#, lm_time=#lm_time#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set state=#state# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set fd_check_state=#fd_check_state#, fd_check_time=#fd_check_time#, fd_check_user=#fd_check_user#, lm_time=#lm_time#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set nd_check_state=#nd_check_state#, nd_check_time=#nd_check_time#, nd_check_user=#nd_check_user#, lm_time=#lm_time#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#

UPDATE qkjm_r_closeorder c SET c.totel_price=( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.total_price),0) FROM ( SELECT p.`total_price` FROM qkjm_r_closeorder_product p WHERE p.order_id=#value# UNION ALL SELECT m.total_price FROM qkjm_r_closeorder_posm m WHERE m.closeOrder_id = #value# )a )WHERE c.uuid=#value#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT s.`biz_user` biz_user, u.`USER_NAME` puser_name,u.`user_sign` puser_sign,s.`biz_time` biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_closeorder a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=4
s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_status01`>0 AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=4 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id# )
GROUP BY s.`biz_user` ORDER BY s.`biz_time` DESC

SELECT MAX(sign50) sign50,MAX(time50) time50,MAX(sign40) sign40,MAX(time40) time40,MAX(sign60) sign60,MAX(time60) time60,MAX(sign70) sign70,MAX(time70) time70,MAX(sign30) sign30,MAX(time30) time30,MAX(sign80) sign80,MAX(time80) time80,MAX(sign20) sign20,MAX(time20) time20 FROM ( SELECT u.`user_sign` sign50,s.`biz_time` time50,NULL sign40,NULL time40,NULL sign60,NULL time60,NULL sign70,NULL time70,null sign30,null time30,null sign80,null time80,NULL sign20,NULL time20 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_closeorder a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=4 AND s.`biz_status04`=10 AND s.`biz_sign`='CLOSEORDER_MDY_FDSTATUS' AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=4 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#) UNION ALL SELECT NULL sign50,NULL time50,u.`user_sign` sign40,s.`biz_time` time40,NULL sign60,NULL time60,NULL sign70,NULL time70,null sign30,null time30,null sign80,null time80,NULL sign20,NULL time20 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_closeorder a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=4 AND s.`biz_status03`=40 AND s.`biz_sign`='CLOSEORDER_MDY_SMDSTATUS' AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=4 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#) UNION ALL SELECT NULL sign50,NULL time50,NULL sign40,NULL time40, u.`user_sign` sign60,s.`biz_time` time60,NULL sign70,NULL time70,null sign30,null time30,null sign80,null time80,NULL sign20,NULL time20 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_closeorder a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=4 AND s.`biz_status03`=50 AND s.`biz_sign`='CLOSEORDER_MDY_SMDSTATUS' AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=4 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#) UNION ALL SELECT NULL sign50,NULL time50,NULL sign40,NULL time40, NULL sign60,NULL time60,u.`user_sign` sign70,s.`biz_time` time70,null sign30,null time30,null sign80,null time80,NULL sign20,NULL time20 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_closeorder a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=4 AND ((s.`biz_status03`=60 AND s.`biz_sign`='CLOSEORDER_MDY_SMDSTATUS') or (s.biz_status02=60 and s.biz_sign='CLOSEORDER_MDY_SDSTATUS') or (s.biz_status02=70 and s.biz_sign='CLOSEORDER_MDY_SDSTATUS')) AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=4 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#) union all
SELECT NULL sign50,NULL time50,NULL sign40,NULL time40,NULL sign60,NULL time60,NULL sign70,NULL time70,u.`user_sign` sign30,s.`biz_time` time30,null sign80,null time80,NULL sign20,NULL time20 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_closeorder a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=4 AND s.`biz_status04`=10 AND s.`biz_sign`='CLOSEORDER_MDY_NDCSTATUS' AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=4 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#)
union all
SELECT NULL sign50,NULL time50,NULL sign40,NULL time40, NULL sign60,NULL time60,NULL sign70,NULL time70,NULL sign30,NULL time30,u.`user_sign` sign80,s.`biz_time` time80,NULL sign20,NULL time20 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_closeorder a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=4 AND ((s.`biz_status03`=70 AND s.`biz_sign`='CLOSEORDER_MDY_SMDSTATUS') or (s.biz_status02=80 and s.biz_sign='CLOSEORDER_MDY_SDSTATUS')) AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=4 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#)
union all
SELECT NULL sign50,NULL time50,NULL sign40,NULL time40, NULL sign60,NULL time60,NULL sign70,NULL time70,NULL sign30,NULL time30,NULL sign80,NULL time80,u.`user_sign` sign20,s.`biz_time` time20 FROM qkjm_h_process s LEFT JOIN qkjm_r_closeorder a ON (a.`uuid`=s.`biz_id`) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u ON (s.`biz_user`=u.`UUID`) WHERE s.`process_id`=4 AND s.`biz_status02`=50 AND s.`biz_sign`='CLOSEORDER_MDY_SDSTATUS' AND NOT ISNULL(u.`user_sign`) AND s.`biz_id`=#biz_id# AND s.`biz_time`>(SELECT MAX(p.`biz_time`) biz_time FROM qkjm_h_process p WHERE p.process_id=4 AND p.biz_status01=0 AND p.`biz_id`=#biz_id#) )a
sqlMap.update: Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set ship_status=#ship_status#, ship_ware=#ship_ware#, ship_date=#ship_date#, ship_no=#ship_no#, ship_cloud=#ship_cloud#, ship_phone=#ship_phone#, remark=#remark#, ship_type=#ship_type#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid = #uuid#
Update qkjm_r_closeorder Set goflag=#goflag# Where uuid = #uuid#
UPDATE qkjm_r_closeorder a SET a.mt_price = ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(total_price),0) FROM qkjm_r_closeorder_memcost WHERE close_id = #value# AND `status` = 1 ) WHERE a.uuid = #value#
